# Harvest

> Background coding agent service that tends to your repositories like farmers tending to crops - autonomous development while you sleep

<!-- MAINTENANCE: When adding new docs, update this index -->

## Quick Start

- [README](README.md): Project overview, architecture, capabilities, getting started
- [Claude Code Configuration](.claude/claude.md): AI agent rules and workflows

## Core AI Rules (All Contexts)

- [Git Workflow](docs/ai/shared/git-workflow.md): Safe-Carry-Forward sync, snapshots, checkpoints, squashing
- [Code Comments](docs/ai/shared/code-comments.md): Explain WHY not WHAT; preserve existing comments
- [Planning Guidelines](docs/ai/shared/planning.md): Research before coding, use Gemini for adversarial review
- [Documentation Standards](docs/ai/shared/documentation.md): Update docs with changes, capture gotchas
- [Pull Request Guidelines](docs/ai/shared/pull-requests.md): PR conventions and review standards

## Context-Specific Rules

- [Local Development Rules](docs/ai/local-development.md): Working locally with Claude CLI
- [Autonomous Agent Rules](docs/ai/autonomous-agent.md): Background agent in Modal sandbox

## MCP Server Guides

- [Gemini MCP](docs/mcp/gemini.md): Plan review and adversarial analysis workflows
- [DevTools MCP](docs/mcp/devtools.md): Chrome DevTools Protocol for browser automation
- [Playwright MCP](docs/mcp/playwright.md): End-to-end testing workflows
- [Memory MCP](docs/mcp/memory.md): Persistent knowledge graph and cross-session memory
